EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for expressing an interest in Markit's securities financing data.
Before we proceed with your request please could you clarify the following:
1. Your full contact details, including your position at the University; 2. Intended use of the data, i.e. the provisional title of the research paper and a brief synopsis; 3. Do you have a research grant to purchase Data Explorers content and if so, for how much? 4. Are you currently using market data from any other source and if so, who? 5. Are you collaborating with any co-author(s) from the same or any other institution(s)? If so, please can you confirm their full contact details (including position at the University)? 6. Intended distribution (if any) for the paper and 7. The scale, region or description of data required.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to get in touch â€“ I hope to hear from you soon.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFirstName} {!Case.OwnerLastName} Markit Securities Finance UK: +44 808 120 2344 | US: +1 866 861 6171 | HK: +852 800 964 146 msf-support@markit.com
